name: Abyssinian Guinea Pig
description: The Abyssinian is a breed of guinea pig that is relatively common as both a pet and show animal.

name: Bears
description: Bears are carnivoran mammals of the family Ursidae. They are classified as caniforms, or doglike carnivorans.

name: Cat
description: The cat is a domestic species of small carnivorous mammal.

name: Dog
description: The dog is a domesticated descendant of the wolf.

name: Elephant
description: Elephants are the largest existing land animals. Three living species are currently recognised: the African bush elephant, the African forest elephant, and the Asian elephant.

name: Fox
description: Fox, any of various members of the dog family (Canidae) resembling small to medium-sized bushy-tailed dogs with long fur, pointed ears, and a narrow snout.

name: Giraffe
description: The giraffe is a large African hoofed mammal belonging to the genus Giraffa. It is the tallest living terrestrial animal and the largest ruminant on Earth.

name: Horse
description: The horse is a domesticated, one-toed, hoofed mammal. It belongs to the taxonomic family Equidae and is one of two extant subspecies of Equus ferus.

name: Impala
description: The impala or rooibok is a medium-sized antelope found in eastern and southern Africa.

name: Jaguar
description: The jaguar is a large cat species and the only living member of the genus Panthera native to the Americas.

name: Kangaroo
description: Kangaroos are four marsupials from the family Macropodidae.

name: Leopard
description: The leopard is one of the five extant species in the genus Panthera, a member of the cat family, Felidae.

name: Monkey
description: Monkey is a common name that may refer to most mammals of the infraorder Simiiformes, also known as the simians.

name: Nutria
description: Nutria are large, web-footed rodents that are more agile in the water than on land. They live in burrows, or nests, never far from the water.

name: Ox
description: An ox, also known as a bullock, is a bovine trained and used as a draft animal.

name: Polar bear
description: The polar bear (Ursus maritimus) is a hypercarnivorous species of bear.

name: Quokka
description: The quokka is a small macropod about the size of a domestic cat.

name: Red panda
description: The red panda, also known as the lesser panda, is a small mammal native to the eastern Himalayas and southwestern China.

name: Snow leopard
description: The snow leopard, also known commonly as the ounce, is a species of large cat in the genus Panthera of the family Felidae.

name: Tiger
description: The tiger is the largest living cat species and a member of the genus Panthera.

name: Urial
description: The urial, also known as the arkars or shapo, is a wild sheep native to Central and South Asia.

name: Valley bulldog
description: The Valley Bulldog is a mixed breed dog's cross between the Boxer and English Bulldog breeds.

name: Welsh terrier
description: The Welsh Terrier originates from Wales and was originally bred for hunting fox, rodents and badger; but during the last century, it has mainly been bred for showing.

name: Xenarthra
description: Xenarthra is a major clade of placental mammals native to the Americas.

name: Yellow mongoose
description: The yellow mongoose, sometimes referred to as the red meerkat, is a member of the mongoose family.

name: Zebra
description: Zebras are African equines with distinctive black-and-white striped coats.
